file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 35-11-02-06 - CONFIG-1 - PRESSURE TRANSDUCER - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PRESSURE TRANSDUCER - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to visually compare the pressure transducer indication on the MFD (Multi Function Display) with the external gauge indication. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY PRESSURE TRANSDUCER INDICATION ACFT MODEL(S) 35-11-02-200-801-A ♦ ON MFD COMPARED WITH EXTERNAL EMB-145 GAUGE INDICATION - VISUAL CHECK EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-1 35-11-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 35-11-02-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 2. PRESSURE TRANSDUCER INDICATION ON MFD COMPARED WITH EXTERNAL GAUGE INDICATION - VISUAL CHECK A. General The function of this inspection is to compare the pressure transducer indication on the MFD with the external gauge indication. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-01/100 - AMM SDS 34-22-00/1 C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 124 124AR Right side of the aircraft nose section D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Main instrument panel 1 Reads the pressure shown on pressure gauge Oxygen servicing panel I. Visually Check Pressure Transducer Indication on MFD Versus External Gauge Indication (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-006-B (1) Do the check of the pressure as follows: (a) Set the MFD display (RH or LH side) to the ECS/Ice system page, refer to (AMM SDS 34-22-00/1). Result: 1 Open access door 124AR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100) and compare the pressure shown on the external pressure gauge with the pressure shown on the MFD display (Max. difference = 100 psi). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 CONFIG-1 35-11-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-006-B (1) Close access door 124AR (AMM MPP 06-41-01/100). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 CONFIG-1 35-11-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
